long_description: Offering great stretch and lightweight warmth, the women's Marmot Sequence Jacket takes you up the hill or down the river trail for a cool-weather ramble in comfort. Polyester/spandex jersey knit is heathered in look and peached for a soft, comfortable feel. Offers UPF 30 sun protection; quick drying. Forward-placed shoulder seam won't chafe under daypack straps. Handwarmer pockets. Marmot Sequence Jacket for women features stylish ruching on the cuffs and back of collar.
short_description: Offering great stretch and lightweight warmth, the women's Marmot Sequence Jacket takes you up the hill or down the river trail for a cool-weather ramble in comfort.
